plugin.name: StatDB
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: Save char info to a sqlite3 db

muclient.script:
internalrevision = "$Rev$"
dofile (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID (), 20) .. "luapath.lua")
require "var" require "serialize" require "commas" require "pluginhelper" require "verify" require "chardb" require "tprint" require "aardutils" require "ldplugin"
db = Statdb:new{} char = {}
sentnoexp = false sentwhois = false
function savelevel(level) local pvar = GetPluginVariable( "aaa0ab9ed92f8fc614664bd1" , "levelinfo")
--get the mob info loadstring( pvar )() levelgains = levelinfo if level then levelgains.newlevel = level end db:savelevel(levelgains) end
function savequest() local quest_total = -1 local quest_avg = 0 local pvar = GetPluginVariable( "aaa8a9eda20fa11787c6b438" , "quest_info")
--get the quest info loadstring( pvar )() quest_stuff = quest_info db:savequest(quest_stuff) end
function savecp() local pvar = GetPluginVariable( "aaa66f81c50828bbbfda7100" , "cp_info")
--get the cp info loadstring( pvar )() db:savecp(cp_info) end
function savewhois() sentwhois = false local pvar = GetPluginVariable( "aaaf9a8dc92f8fc614663ac0" , "whoisinfo")
--get the whois stuff loadstring( pvar )() db:savewhois( whoisinfo ) if db:countlevels() == 0 then levelinfo = {} levelinfo.type = "level" levelinfo.level = tonumber(db:getstat('totallevels')) levelinfo.str = 0 levelinfo.int = 0 levelinfo.wis = 0 levelinfo.dex = 0 levelinfo.con = 0 levelinfo.luc = 0 levelinfo.starttime = GetInfo(304) levelinfo.hp = 0 levelinfo.mp = 0 levelinfo.mv = 0 levelinfo.pracs = 0 levelinfo.trains = 0 levelinfo.bonustrains = 0 levelinfo.blessingtrains = 0 db:savelevel(levelinfo, true) end end
function savemobkill() local pvar = GetPluginVariable( "aaa61c4570508448e19c7c14", "kill_info")
-- get the kill loadstring( pvar )() db:savemobkill( kill_info ) end
function savegq() local pvar = GetPluginVariable( "aaa77f81c5408278ccda7100", "gq_info")
-- get the gqquest loadstring( pvar )() db:savegq( gq_info ) end
function createmilestone() Execute("whois") DoAfterSpecial(5, "aftermilestone()", 12) end
function aftermilestone() level = db:getstat('totallevels') tlist = convertlevel(level) if tlist.tier == 9 then milestone = string.format("t%s+%sr%sl%s", tlist.tier, tlist.redos, tlist.remort, tlist.level) else milestone = string.format("t%sr%sl%s", tlist.tier, tlist.remort, tlist.level) end db:addmilestone(milestone) end
function AddMilestone(cmddict) if cmddict[1] then if db:addmilestone(cmddict[1]) > 0 then phelper:plugin_header("") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "added milestone " .. cmddict[1]) ColourNote( "", "", "") end else phelper:plugin_header('compare') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " addmilestone <milestonename>") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "add a milestone to the database") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) argument 1 is the name of the milestone to add") end end
fieldstocomp = { 'totallevels', 'qpearned', 'questscomplete', 'questsfailed', 'campaignsdone', 'campaignsfld', 'gquestswon', 'duelswon', 'duelslost', 'timeskilled', 'monsterskilled', 'combatmazewins', 'combatmazedeaths', 'powerupsall', 'totaltrivia', }
function formatheader(name1, name2) ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format("%-20s" , "Item"), RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format("%-10s" , name1), RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format("%-10s", name2), RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format("%-10s", "Difference")) ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", "____________________________________________________") end
function formatitem(itemname, value1, value2, value3) ColourTell(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format("%-20s" , itemname), RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format("%-10s" , tostring(value1)), RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format("%-10s", tostring(value2)))
if value3 then ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format("%-10s", tostring(value3))) else ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format("%-10d", math.abs(value1 - value2))) end end
function formatCompMile(milestone1, milestone2) phelper:plugin_header("Comparing " .. milestone1.milestone .. " to " .. milestone2.milestone) formatheader(milestone1.milestone, milestone2.milestone) local datemile1 = os.date("%x", milestone1.time) local timemile1 = os.date("%X", milestone1.time) local timesec1 = milestone1.time if milestone1.time < 1 then datemile1 = 'Now' timemile1 = '' timesec1 = GetInfo(304) end local datemile2 = os.date("%x", milestone2.time) local timemile2 = os.date("%X", milestone2.time) local timesec2 = milestone2.time if milestone2.time < 1 then datemile2 = 'Now' timemile2 = '' timesec2 = GetInfo(304) end local datediff = timesec1 - timesec2 if timesec2 > timesec1 then datediff = timesec2 - timesec1 end local timed = format_time(datediff) formatitem('Date', datemile1, datemile2, timed) formatitem('Time', timemile1, timemile2, '') for h,item in pairs(fieldstocomp) do formatitem(item, milestone1[item] or 0, milestone2[item] or 0) end ColourNote( "", "", "") end
function CompareMilestones(cmddict) if cmddict[1] == 'help' then phelper:plugin_header('compare') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " compareamilestone <milestone1> <milestone2>") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "compare two milestones in the database") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) argument 1 is the first milestone to compare") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) argument 2 is the second milestone to compare") return end local milestone1 = {} local milestone2 = {} if #cmddict == 0 then sql1 = "SELECT * FROM stats WHERE milestone = 'current'" sql2 = "SELECT * FROM stats WHERE milestone = 'start'" elseif #cmddict == 1 then sql1 = "SELECT * FROM stats WHERE milestone = 'current'" sql2 = "SELECT * FROM stats WHERE milestone = '" .. cmddict[1] .. "'" elseif #cmddict >= 2 then sql1 = "SELECT * FROM stats WHERE milestone = '" .. cmddict[1] .. "'" sql2 = "SELECT * FROM stats WHERE milestone = '" .. cmddict[2] .. "'" end if db:open() then for a in db.db:nrows(sql1) do milestone1 = a end for a in db.db:nrows(sql2) do milestone2 = a end db:close() end if not next(milestone1) or not next(milestone2) then phelper:plugin_header("") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "one of the milestones does not exist") ColourNote( "", "", "") return end formatCompMile(milestone1, milestone2) end
function ListMilestones(cmddict) if cmddict[1] == 'help' then phelper:plugin_header('list') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " listmilestones") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "list all milestones in the database") return end if cmddict[1] then findstr, n = string.gsub(cmddict[1], "*", "%%") findstr, n = string.gsub(findstr, "?", "_") sql = "SELECT milestone FROM stats WHERE milestone like '" .. findstr .. "'" else sql = "SELECT milestone FROM stats" end if db:open() then if db:getlastrowid('stats') > 0 then max = nil min = nil sql2 = "SELECT MIN(totallevels) as MIN, MAX(totallevels) as MAX FROM stats WHERE stats.totallevels == stats.milestone" for a in db.db:nrows(sql2) do max = a['MAX'] min = a['MIN'] end phelper:plugin_header("Milestones") if max then ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", 'levels between ' .. min .. ' and ' .. max) elseif min ~= nil then ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", 'level ' .. tostring(min)) end for b in db.db:nrows(sql) do test = tonumber(b['milestone']) if test ~= nil then if test > tonumber(max) or test < tonumber(min) then ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", b['milestone']) end else ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", b['milestone']) end end ColourNote( "", "", "") end db:close() end end
function cmdBackup(cmddict) if #cmddict == 0 then phelper:plugin_header('backup') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " backup <extension>") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "backup the database") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) argument 1 is the extension to use") end db:backupdb(cmddict[1]) end
function cmdFixTable(cmddict) if #cmddict == 0 then ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", "Please specify a table") return true end db:fixtable(cmddict[1]) end
function cmdCampaignxp(cmddict) phelper:plugin_header("Campaign XP") if #cmddict == 0 then phelper:plugin_header('campaignxp') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " campaignxp <tnlxp>") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "this sets noexp to come on when your exp to next level is less than the argument") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) argument 1 is threshhold for exp tnl, use 'off' to remove") return true end if cmddict[1] == 'off' then phelper:set('dontlevelnocampaign', false) ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", 'noexp will not be used when no campaign for a level') return end local tnl = verify_number(cmddict[1]) if tnl then if tnl < tonumber(char.base.perlevel) then phelper:set('campaignxp', tnl) phelper:set('dontlevelnocampaign', true) ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", "If you haven't taken a campaign for this level then at < " .. tostring(tnl) .. 'xp, noexp will be set') else ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", tostring(tnl) .. ' is higher than your xp per level') return end end end
function checkcampaign(level) local res, clevel = CallPlugin("aaa66f81c50828bbbfda7100", "isoncp") clevel = tonumber(clevel) if tonumber(char.status.level) == 200 or tonumber(char.status.level) == 201 then return end if clevel == -1 or clevel ~= level then db:checktable('campaigns')
local numlevels = 0 local totallevels = db:getstat('totallevels') if db:open() then for a in db.db:rows(string.format("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM campaigns where level = %d;", totallevels)) do numlevels = tonumber(a[1]) end db:close() end
if numlevels ~= 1 then if verify_bool(GetPluginVariable("aaa65ac8122d795ad5348dcd", "noexp")) == false and sentnoexp == false then sentnoexp = true Send("noexp") end end end end
function dbbackup(name) local day = os.date("%a", GetInfo(304)) if name == "backuptimermid" then db:backupdb(day .. '.midnight') elseif name == "backuptimernoon" then db:backupdb(day .. '.noon') else db:backupdb(day) end end

function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if id == "aaa8a9eda20fa11787c6b438" and (msg == 6 or msg == 8) then savequest() elseif id == "aaa0ab9ed92f8fc614664bd1" and msg == 1 then savelevel() elseif id == "aaa0ab9ed92f8fc614664bd1" and (msg == 3 or msg == 4) then createmilestone() elseif id == "aaa0ab9ed92f8fc614664bd1" and msg == 8 then createmilestone() db:resetclasses() DoAfterSpecial(10, "savelevel()", 12) elseif id == "aaa0ab9ed92f8fc614664bd1" and msg == 6 then createmilestone('remort') DoAfterSpecial(10, "savelevel()", 12) elseif id == "aaaf9a8dc92f8fc614663ac0" and msg == 1 then sentwhois = false savewhois() elseif id == "aaa66f81c50828bbbfda7100" and (msg == 3 or msg == 4) then savecp() elseif id == "aaa61c4570508448e19c7c14" and msg == 1 then savemobkill() elseif id == "aaa77f81c5408278ccda7100" and msg == 4 then savegq() elseif id == '3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264' then if text:find("char") then res, gmcparg = CallPlugin("3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264","gmcpval","char") char = assert (loadstring ('return ' .. gmcparg or ""))()
if char.status and char.status.state and (tonumber(char.status.state) == 3 or tonumber(char.status.state) == 8) and db:getstat('totallevels') == nil and sentwhois == false then sentwhois = true Execute('whois') end
if char.status and tonumber(char.status.tnl) < phelper.campaignxp then if phelper.dontlevelnocampaign and not verify_bool(GetPluginVariable('aaa65ac8122d795ad5348dcd', 'noexp')) and not sentnoexp and (tonumber(char.status.state) == 8 or tonumber(char.status.state) == 3) then checkcampaign(tonumber(char.status.level)) end end end elseif id == "aaa65ac8122d795ad5348dcd" then sentnoexp = false elseif id == "aaa66f81c50828bbbfda7100" and msg == 5 and phelper.dontlevelnocampaign and verify_bool(GetPluginVariable('aaa65ac8122d795ad5348dcd', 'noexp')) and not sentnoexp then
sentnoexp = true Send('noexp') end
phelper:OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) end
function OnPluginInstall () --OnPluginEnable is automatically called by pluginhelper
phelper:OnPluginInstall() end -- OnPluginInstall
function OnPluginClose ()
phelper:OnPluginClose() end -- OnPluginClose
function OnPluginEnable () ldplugin('broadcast_quest', 'aaa8a9eda20fa11787c6b438') ldplugin('broadcast_level', 'aaa0ab9ed92f8fc614664bd1') ldplugin('broadcast_whois', 'aaaf9a8dc92f8fc614663ac0') ldplugin('broadcast_cp', 'aaa66f81c50828bbbfda7100') ldplugin('broadcast_kills', 'aaa61c4570508448e19c7c14') ldplugin('broadcast_gq', 'aaa77f81c5408278ccda7100') ldplugin('broadcast_noexp', 'aaa65ac8122d795ad5348dcd')
phelper:OnPluginEnable()
if IsConnected() then res, gmcparg = CallPlugin("3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264","gmcpval","char") char = assert (loadstring ('return ' .. gmcparg or ""))() end dbbackup() end -- OnPluginEnable
function OnPluginDisable ()
phelper:OnPluginDisable() end -- OnPluginDisable
function OnPluginConnect ()
phelper:OnPluginConnect() end -- function OnPluginConnect
function OnPluginDisconnect ()
phelper:OnPluginDisconnect() end -- function OnPluginConnect
function OnPluginSaveState ()
phelper:OnPluginSaveState() end -- function OnPluginSaveState

phelper:add_cmd('listmilestones', {func=ListMilestones, help="list all milestones", sortgroup="Milestones", prio=40}) phelper:add_cmd('addmilestone', {func=AddMilestone, help="add a milestone", sortgroup="Milestones", prio=41}) phelper:add_cmd('comparemilstone', {func=CompareMilestones, help="compare two milestones", sortgroup="Milestones", prio=42})
phelper:add_cmd('campaignxp', {func=cmdCampaignxp, help="set noexp if a campaign hasn't been taken and tnl is less than the argument to this function, use 'off' (no quotes) disable", sortgroup="Campaign", prio=43})
phelper:add_cmd('backup', {func=cmdBackup, help="backup the database, the only argument is the extension", sortgroup="Database", prio=44}) --phelper:add_cmd('fixtable', {func=cmdFixTable, help="fix a table", sortgroup="Database", prio=45})
phelper:set_default('cmd', 'statdb') phelper:set_default('plugin_colour', 'orange')
phelper:add_setting('dontlevelnocampaign', {help="set this to true to automatically set noexp at <campaignxp tnl if you haven't done a campaign this level", type="bool", default=false}) phelper:add_setting('campaignxp', {help="tnl to check to set noexp if you haven't done a campaign this level", type="number", default=500, low=50})
phelper:enable()
